body:
@Dragoonofinfinity Because artists love to redraw anything regardless of how bad or stupid the original was.That goes for anything involving any main character.If you wanna watch an interesting show just skip any main character stuff unless its fair or it makes sense unlike this one here.
Same goes if you wanna watch good porn.
yeah!! great timing especially that its being aired on animax now!
i read an old thread the pitou was genderless.
Because is one of the hughlights of the show
Ok, I know Gon fucks Pitou up in the show, but why does every doujin artist feel the need to redraw that scene?
